directions: In a large bowl, mix together condensed milk and lemon juice. Fold in whipped topping, then stir in walnuts.
Pour half of mixture into each graham cracker crust. Freeze 4 to 6 hours before serving. Store leftovers in freezer.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Millionaire Pie III
